alert.note: Alert for Emmons; Grant; Morton; Sioux (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued March 11 at 3:03PM CST until March 12 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT TO 10 AM CDT /9 AM MDT/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Emmons, Grant, Morton, and Sioux Counties. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until midnight CST /11 PM MST/ tonight. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from midnight CST /11 PM MST/ tonight to 10 AM CDT /9 AM MDT/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Even though the snow may have ended, the strong winds will continue to bring ground blizzard conditions through this evening, with areas of blowing snow continuing overnight.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle.
